0.text: Innate- Shard of the Monolith: Malphite gains increased percentage size equal to 8% of his total armor, capped at 35% increased size at 437.5 armor.
0.html: Innate- Shard of the Monolith: Malphite gains increased percentage size equal to 8% of his total armor, capped at 35% increased size at 437.5 armor.

1.text: Innate: Malphite  shields himself for 9% of his maximum health. The shield lasts until it is broken, and refreshes after a few seconds of not taking damage.
1.html: Innate: Malphite shields himself for 9% of his maximum health. The shield lasts until it is broken, and refreshes after a few seconds of not taking damage.

0.text: Active: Malphite sends a shard to the target enemy that deals magic damage and  slows them for 3 seconds.
0.html: Active: Malphite sends a shard to the target enemy that deals magic damage and slows them for 3 seconds.

1.text: Malphite also gains  bonus movement speed equal to the raw amount the target lost from the slow for the duration.
1.html: Malphite also gains  bonus movement speed equal to the raw amount the target lost from the slow for the duration.

0.text: Passive: Malphite gains  bonus armor, tripled while  Granite Shield is active.
0.html: Passive: Malphite gains  bonus armor, tripled while Granite Shield is active.

1.text: Active: Malphite empowers his next basic attack within 6 seconds to gain  50 bonus range and deal  bonus physical damage  on-hit.
1.html: Active: Malphite empowers his next basic attack within 6 seconds to gain  50 bonus range and deal bonus physical damage on-hit.

2.text: Additionally, Malphite's basic attacks  on-hit for the next 5 seconds are empowered to trigger a cone in the direction of the target that deals physical damage to enemies hit.
2.html: Additionally, Malphite's basic attacks on-hit for the next 5 seconds are empowered to trigger a cone in the direction of the target that deals physical damage to enemies hit.

3.text: Thunderclap  resets Malphite's basic attack timer.
3.html: Thunderclap resets Malphite's basic attack timer.

0.text: Active: Malphite slams the ground beneath him, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies and  crippling them for 3 seconds.
0.html: Active: Malphite slams the ground beneath him, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies and crippling them for 3 seconds.

0.text: Active: Malphite  dashes with  displacement immunity to the target location. Upon arrival, he deals magic damage to nearby enemies and  knocks them up for 1.5 seconds.
0.html: Active: Malphite dashes with displacement immunity to the target location. Upon arrival, he deals magic damage to nearby enemies and knocks them up for 1.5 seconds.

1.text: Unstoppable Force will cast at max range if cast beyond that.
1.html: Unstoppable Force will cast at max range if cast beyond that.
